summary: Northern Encounters extras 1 is add-on to Northern Encounters mod. Can be also used independently.
descriptionHtml:
Northern Encounters - extras 1

== Requirements

Official DLCs Dawnguard and Dragonborn.

This mod is also in spanish http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68377/?

Northern Encounters -mod is optional.

== About mod

Mod adds deadly black predator slaughterfishes, battlemonks and Bob's manifestations wandering outside Bob's domain, in many places and in many forms.

It's up to you to track down and kill all Bob's manifestations. Luckily Bob's manifestations aren't as strong as Bob in his domain*

* Bob's domain is only in Northern Encounters -mod (newer versions than 2.1e)

== Tips & facts

There's a journal you should find and read. It's located west from Northwatch Keep, near the shore. For those who have Northern Encounters -mod, it's located north from the door to Bob's domain.

For those who don't know yet what Bob is; he's evil spirit that lives somewhere out of this world, in place he refers as his domain. He can take human form by possessing his victim. Evil spirit can't be killed, but corpse he's possessing can be.

This mod adds 10 Bob's manifestations wandering outside his domain. They are a bit weaker than Bob in his domain.

This mod also adds battlemonks. Usually they are interested about places where something markable or otherwise valuable/rare can be found. There's also a rumor that atleast one battlemonk is looking for daedric armor that Baltar has hidden. Or just something that relates to magic.

And then there's these fishes... better watch out, black predator slaughterfishes live near the shore. They can also jump to land, although not far from the water.
author: i73fi
